ComicInfo.Title: The Perfect Mark; King of the Court!; Tower of Vengeance; The Perfect Butler; The Locket
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Perfect Mark: Two burglars mean to rob an old man. But they expected him to be helpless.
King of the Court!: All the local kids consider Jackie to be 'King of the court', meaning he is the best basketball player around. When Mike challenges him, Jackie is eager to prove his mettle. However, because of a heart condition, he dies before he can, and his ghost will have to prove he is still the king.
Tower of Vengeance: A couple of shipwreckers take refuge from a storm in an old lighthouse. It turns out the lighthouse is not abandoned, as they thought.
The Perfect Butler: All their lives, Ronald and Henry have been master and servant. So why let death stop a good working relation?
The Locket: Doris has come to visit her aging aunt, hoping to get her hands on auntie's valuable locket. But she finds out she is not the first to covet the precious trinket.
